author: AETerry
title: Holiday Building Set Review
review:
My daughter is the one who got this one in her stocking on Christmas and then had me (Mom) put it together for her as she's not quite ready for picture instructions.

 

I think it was a bit too advanced for her as once it was done, she wasn't really interested in playing with it and handed it back to me.

 

Which.... that's okay, perhaps in another couple years she'll have changed her mind. In the mean time, I found this set rather enjoyable and fun to put together, having pieces for a fireplace, stocking, tree and presents. Something new that I don't have pieces for were the flat tile pieces that look like cards or envelopes.

 

All this little set needs were just a couple minifigures enjoying the scene, something easilly fixed from the box full of minifigures that I have.

 

In the end, this is just a lovely and beautiful little set and one that works easilly as something to build and place around for display at christmas time.
